transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Hmm. Salim sir, Harish baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se, kaise hain sir?

Customer: Kaun baat kar raha hai?

Executive: Harish, Harish IndiaMART se sir.

Customer: Ji, bataiye sir.

Executive: Kuch improvement dikh raha hai sir?

Customer: Kya batau, mai bada pareshan hu.

Executive: Ab batane ke liye kuch raha nahi hai. Dekho mai aapko, beside aap IndiaMART ke sath saat saal se hain sir, thik hai?

Customer: Nahi, nahi, suniye, ek baar, ek baar meri aap yeh request le lijiye. Bhale hi mujhe loss hoga, mujhe malum hai, chhe mahina mera waste gaya hai.

Aap mera refund kara do. Kitna hota hai woh mujhe bata do, kyuki mujhe abhi bharosa nahi raha hai, abhi aa hi nahi raha hai. Abhi maine just 10-15 minute pehle ek digital ki, ek maine pehle dekhi. Jaise hi mujhe lead dikhai di, maine usko liya, expire soon. Kya problem hai? Kyu nahi dikha de raha hai? Mai kam se kam last chhe mahine se face kar raha hu.

Executive: Sir, aapko mai batana chahta hu, thik hai? Ki ek buylead ko paanch log use kar sakte hain. Number of suppliers zyada hain aapke.

Customer: Bhai, usko mai abhi 50 baar sun chuka hu. Mai isliye bol raha hu ki aapki service mujhe abhi nahi chahiye. Mai apna refund maang raha hu. Aap mujhe refund kar do, mujhe aapki service nahi chahiye.

Aap paanch ko kya, 500 logo ko de dena, lekin mujhe nahi chahiye aap tumhara koi bhi yeh lalach wali cheez. Yeh paanch ko de diye, paanch ko de diya, kya yeh kya muft mein de rahe ho aap?

Executive: Mai samajh raha hu.

Customer: Paise toh le rahe ho sabke.

Hazaro logo se paisa le liya hai iske liye. Kya baat kar rahe ho sir aap, aap bol rahe ho paanch ko de diya, paanch ko de diya, kuch bhi nahi aata hai. Mai bol raha hu aap mera refund kar do bas, mujhe kuch nahi karna hai sir, paisa wapis kar do mera.

Executive: Dekho, mai aapko batata hu, thik hai? Ki dekho sir, aap IndiaMART pe purane hain, conversion aapko aa raha hai, thodi thodi dikkate aa rahi hain, koi doubt ho jaani hai.

Customer: Nahi, nahi, mujhe naya kuch bhi nahi dekhna hai. Aap me, aap mera, bhale mera chhe mahina mera loss jayega, lekin aap mera wapis kar do, mujhe nahi chahiye aapki service. Mujhe aap refund kar do paisa. Mujhe malum hai ki har din aap pareshan karte rehte ho aur time nikalte ho, apna, apna hi dekhte ho bas. Hamara kuch nahi dekhna hai. Aap, aap bol rahe ho, kuch bhi toh nahi ho raha hai. Isse kuch nahi ho raha hai bhai sahab, aap, aap request mai kar raha hu, mai baar baar message bhi kar raha hu. Mai ab loss nahi karna chahta aur nahi ab mere paas itna aapke jaisa masat nahi hai ki sabko pareshan karta rahu. Isliye mere paas itna time nahi hai bhai. Aap request karta hu aap sab meri rad do isko aur mere ko pehle amount bata do meri ki aapka yeh refund ho raha hai. Aap mujhe refund kar do bas.

Executive: Sir, ek baat batao, aapko maine do teen company ka reference diya tha. Maine unko, aapko bhi bataya, dikhaya bhi sir, thik hai? Ki unke paas buylead ka conversion kitna kam hai sir. Sir, aap apne, mai kehta hu ki aap mujhe aapki service nahi chahiye. Nahi chahiye, kyuki mujhe nahi mil raha hai jo jis, jo problem hai woh solve toh kar nahi pa rahe ho aap log. Aur mai, matlab yeh time nikalo aap. Aap bolo toh mai aap roz aapka phone ka mai jawab dunga aur aapse hi baat karta rahunga, bhale hi mera business na ho, hai na? Yeh karu? Mai aapko call karu samne se roz? Mai aapka paise, isi ka mera paise kaat dena.

Customer: Koi baat nahi. Mera time aur paisa isi mein katega. Aap aapse baat karta rahunga. Puri, pura teen saal mai aapse baat karta rahunga bas. Mai aapse, mai mujhe na lead chahiye, na inquiry chahiye. Aap, aap bas paise, aap, aapse baat karu uske liye aap paise kaat lena. Time kaato, paisa kaato.

Executive: Nahi, dekho mai samajh raha hu sir aapki baat ko but dekho, toh aapko kya hai ki service.

Customer: Nahi samajhna nahi hai bhai, kyu pareshan kiya ja rahe ho? Mai, mai phone kaat du isse pehle mai aapko yeh bata du ki aap refund ki request daal do iske andar ya refund kar do yaar, kyu pareshan kar rahe ho?

Mai bol raha hu yaar samajh nahi rahe ho? Mere paas kya itna free time hai aapki jaisa? Aap samajh nahi pa rahe ho sir. Aap refund naam se mujhe de dijiye sir aap yeh bataiye. Aapko buylead de rahe hain, aapko inquiry de rahe hain. Kya? 166 plus inquiry aapke paas ja rahi hai sir.

Executive: Kya hua?

Executive: Mai keh raha hu mahine mein aapko 150 plus buylead aur inquiry ja rahi hai sir.

Customer: Are bhai, usko chhodo na tum le lo na bhai.

Executive: Sir, aap le lo na sir.

Customer: Are tum le lo na bhai, woh tum le lo. 150 nahi 2000 le lo uska. Hai na? Woh sab aap, woh, woh tum log rakho. Tum apne paas hi rakho.

Executive: Sir, ek cheez bataiye sir, thik hai? Aap koi bhi saman le lijiye.

Customer: Are bhai, server nahi banna hai tumhara yaha. Khali itna kar do bhai sahab. Aap, aapse nahi ho raha hai toh mujhe aage aur kisi ke paas bhej do. Aap, aap, aapke paas nahi hai kuch bhi yaha sir. Mai, mai abhi bata raha hu, bilkul clear bata raha hu, ek tarah service hai aur paisa ka bilkul lost hai abhi mera. Isliye chhe mahine se aap pareshan kar rahe ho aur bhi pareshan karna hai, dhai saal toh mai aise hi chhod du usko.

Executive: Sir, mai ek baar fir se baat kar leta hu apni team se, kyuki maine baat kiya toh woh refund.

Customer: Bhai, team se baat karke kya fayda hoga? Jo kaam nahi ho raha hai uska mujhe aap, aapki service hai, mai aapko ek, ek bade samman ke sath aapko request kar raha hu ki bhai sahab aap mera kaat do. Dekho, dekho sir, saari cheeze mere haath mein nahi hoti hai na sir.

Customer: Aap bolo toh mai apni yaha se sab kuch delete kar deta hu, application bhi nikal deta hu, udhar se delete, logout kar deta hu, sab kuch kar deta hu, abhi kar deta hu. Aap bas request meri le lo ki.

Executive: Dekho, woh solution nahi hai delete karna, thoda sa time.

Customer: Toh mai abhi yeh samjhu ki paise aapko rakhna hai toh mai yaha se sab delete kar du?

Executive: Yeh paise, logout karke sab delete kar do. Thoda sa time, thoda sa time dijiye, mai ek baar update karta hu.

Customer: Par kya time nikalna hai bhai? Abhi chhe mahina toh nikal gaya hai iske andar. Aur de dijiye sir 50 din bas, 50 din ka hi time maang raha hu.

Customer: Toh chhe mahine ka, mai bolunga chhe mahine pehle ka mujhe aap refund do do, tab, aap doge mujhe chhe mahine ka mujhe batao. Nahi, bilkul nahi. Ab aur ek chhe mahina nikaloge, fir bologe ki aapka, aapka toh chhe mahina use kiya hai. Sir, do teen din ka time dijiye. Chhe mahine ka, chhe mahine maine aapko, chhe mahine maine aapko sab bola. Mai bol raha hu, mai bol raha hu chhe mahine se mujhe nahi mil raha hai. Teen din ka time dijiye mai jo hamare manager hain, unke sath agar nahi baat hui hai meri, mai Avinash ji se baat karta rehta hu, usko pata hai, usne catalog pe bhi kaam kiya hai, group pe bhi kiya hai. Mai aapko baat karke aapko. Are bhai sahab aap itna time toh aapne bhi le liya, ek mahina toh aapse itni problem solve karne mein lag gaya hai. Itna toh aap, bache, kya batau yaar aap aapko bhi. Aap, aap mat karo please, mera, mai aap refund kar do, mujhe nahi chahiye aapki service nahi chahiye.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Ji sir.

Executive: Mujhe time dijiye mai ek baar apne team se baat kar leta hu.

Customer: Nahi, nahi, mujhe time, mai time nahi de raha hu. Mai abhi uske andar.

Executive: Sir, mai aapko refund nahi hai, mai nahi kar sakta sir. Thank you. Sorry.

Customer: Toh jiske haath mein ho usko bhi bol do na bhai, usko call karao. Mai wahi mai keh raha hu, isliye mai aapse time maang raha hu. Thik hai, mai unko bol raha hu yaha pe update kar do. Toh fir kyu magajmari mere sath kar rahe ho? Mai refund maang raha hu toh. Mai kuch nahi kar raha hu, toh mujhe time dijiye, mai update kar dunga. Aap toh mujhe pehle bhi woh itna power karke bata rahe the ki mai kal aapko karwa dunga, shaam ko kar dunga, sab dopahar ko kar dunga. Toh woh, woh power dikhaiye na idhar se ki aap kar sakte hain yeh refund.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Sir, kuch nahi rahe ho, bas baatein karna aati hai sabko. Bekar hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Feels the service is not providing value.

- Expresses frustration with expired buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund not in his control.

- Executive asked for more time to update.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive will talk to his team again.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, service
